mapper.update: UPDATE FREEBOARD_TBL SET FREEBOARD_TITLE=#{freeBoardTitle}, FREEBOARD_CONTENT=#{freeBoardContent}, FREEBOARD_FILENAME=#{freeBoardFilename}, FREEBOARD_FILEPATH=#{freeBoardFilepath}, FREEBOARD_FILELENGTH=#{freeBoardFilelength} WHERE FREEBOARD_NO=#{freeBoardNo}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM FREEBOARD_TBL ORDER BY FREEBOARD_NO DESC
